channel.title: Npcdrops new problem ... delta 317
channel.description:
i added everything right "didnt get any errors!" but when i kill the npc nothing apears ...
I added drops for: man's woman's guards druids and wizards.. i just whrote myself the original drops like on runescape always used the tab button
i did it like this "npcdrop = 1 526 1 100" i get a error when i do that and when i use "Npcdrops" on place of "npcdrops" i get none but my drop wont apear like i allready said
